name: AFRA B

top_projects.name: Inbuilt-Chatbot
top_projects.description: This is a simple chatbot program that simulates a conversation with a user. The bot can respond to predefined questions about AI-related topics. It can also greet the user and respond to exit commands. Additionally, users have the option to add new questions and answers to expand the chatbot's knowledge.

top_projects.name: Vigil-Eye
top_projects.description: Vigil Eye is a real-time driver monitoring system designed to detect drowsiness and alert the driver with an audible warning. Using computer vision, machine learning, and an intuitive graphical interface, this system provides a reliable solution to enhance road safety.

top_projects.name: Meme-Classifier
top_projects.description: This project is a simple image classification model that distinguishes between two categories of memes: "Rickroll" and "Women and Cat Yelling". The model uses a convolutional neural network (CNN) architecture built with TensorFlow/Keras to train and classify meme images.

top_projects.name: Ai_image_generator
top_projects.description: This project leverages the  Stable Diffusion V5 model to create stunning images based on text prompts. Simply provide a description, and the AI will generate an image and save it to your desktop.

top_projects.name: RAG-based-LLM-application
top_projects.description: This project is a Real-Time Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)-Based Language Model (LLM) Application built using Pathway, a real-time processing engine. This application enhances the capabilities of large language models (LLMs) by integrating external knowledge retrieval from real-time data sources.

top_projects.name: Superhero-Prediction
top_projects.description: This Superhero prediction project uses logistic regression to predict a superhero's name based on various attributes. It utilizes Pandas for data manipulation, Matplotlib for visualization (if needed), and Scikit-learn for machine learning.

top_projects.name: E-Commerce-Skincare-Website
top_projects.description: Skinzy is a demo e-commerce website which features a simple, effective skincare product to choose from. It is designed to provide a preview of how you can explore, search, and shop for skincare products.

afrashamim/RAG-based-LLM-application.summary: Recent updates to the RAG-based LLM application involved refactoring and updating the README file with new information.

afrashamim/Vigil-Eye.summary: The Vigil-Eye repository recently went through significant updates, starting with an initial commit and getting a new README file along with several pushes of files.

afrashamim/Ai_image_generator.summary: There were notable updates to the AI image generator involving adding files through uploads and refactoring the README file.

afrashamim/Meme-Classifier.summary: The Meme Classifier repository witnessed important activity as a README file was added and further refinements were made through subsequent commits.

afrashamim/Superhero-Prediction.summary: Activity on the Superhero Prediction repository included second iteration updates as well as addition of a new README file, ensuring enhanced clarity and documentation.

profile_summary:
Afra B is a highly skilled and accomplished developer with a strong proficiency in Python, Jupyter Notebook, and HTML. With a solid foundation in programming languages and a keen interest in data-driven solutions, Afra has established herself as a reliable and innovative professional in the field of software development. Her technical expertise has enabled her to showcase her coding capabilities through 7 public repositories, demonstrating her ability to collaborate and contribute to the open-source community.

Afra's dedication to her craft has earned her a professional network of like-minded developers, with a notable following of 2. This indicates her influence and credibility as a respected member of the development community. With a strong focus on delivering high-quality solutions, Afra excels in leveraging her technical skills to drive meaningful results and drive innovation in her field. As a committed and driven professional, Afra B is well-positioned to tackle complex challenges and make significant contributions to the tech industry.
